hadiths.text: Narrated Sahl bin Sad: A woman came to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) and said, "O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)! I want to give up myself to you." A man said, "Marry her to me." The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "We agree to marry her to you with what you know of the Qur'an by heart

chapter.ara-name: باب وَكَالَةِ الْمَرْأَةِ الإِمَامَ فِي النِّكَاحِ
chapter.eng-name: A woman can depute the ruler in marriage
